A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a saturday night fun popcorn movie\, this film was enjoyable in that aspect but as a Star Wars movie and second part of a trilogy\, it failed miserably. Too many holes and inconsistancies in the story. The movie also didn't know if it wanted to be a sequel or a stand alone movie\, resulting in the story being a total mess. A very low point for the franchise.
